    Class Editor

    The editor manager class. Handles all interactions with editors.

    May be overridden to override default event implementations.

    Inherits from

    • Object (base class)

    Fields

    Name Type Description
    game DGame
    server WebSocketServer

    Methods

    Name Description
    initialize Initializes the editor with a DGame instance.
    registerEventHandler Registers an event callback, for when an event with the given key is received.
    send Sends a message to all attached editors.
    send Sends a message to all attached editors.
    send Sends a message to all attached editors.
    send Sends a message to all attached editors.
    shutdown Shutsdown the editor interface.
    unregisterEventHandler Unregisters an event callback.
    update Processes pending events.
    onInitialize To be overridden
    onPausePlay To be overridden
    onStartPlay To be overridden
    onStopPlay To be overridden
    processEvents Processes all pending events.

    Aliases

    Name Description
    JsonEventHandler
    JsonEventResponseHandler
    TypedEventHandler
    TypedEventResponseHandler
